basic.description: Computers are changing our lives; this is a course for any student interested in learning about computing. It surveys many fields of computing science, presents case studies of fascinating examples of computers in use in diverse areas, from searching the world-wide web to medicine, and discusses the possibilities, limitations, and risks of computers.
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Computers: Applications and Implications

extra.enrollment_requirement: One-way exclusion    May not be taken with or after CISC124.
